sense.examples: The advertisements really regenerated the company's image. The administration hopes to regenerate enthusiasm for Reagan economics.

These procedures can reverse some of the damage by regenerating lost bone. After normal use, any of the forms of DRIERITE may be regenerated for reuse. Livers can be regenerated using stem cells from blood.

sense.name: Bring, lead, or force to abandon an evil path or lifestyle and adopt a right course of action.
sense.examples: He is actually regenerating all His elect. He never spiritually cried to God till God regenerated his soul.

sense.name: Amplify an electron current by causing part of the power on the output circuit to act upon the input circuit.
sense.examples: The MZI output signal after passing through the 2R limiter circuit was regenerated.
